description:
This course is intended for Bernina Software 7 owners who want to learn all the ins and outs of Bernina Software 7.

This course is not more than 60 min of Bernina Software 7, and the sixteenth course of Master the Fundamentals of Bernina Embroidery Software 7.

To digitizing a design with no artwork, just with an idea in your head can be done and is great fun too.

Understanding your digitizing tools, and for this class specific the Rectangle and Elipse tools, makes planning and creating of a design so much easier.

The correct tool to draw or build your design is vital

The options you have with this tools, and how to manage it.

Manage your fill stitches will be part of this class and any of the following classes, and you will start to understand the importance of the choice between a drawing tool, and what stitch selection to use.

..................................

We have broken Bernina Software 7 down into 20 courses of not more than 60 min each for your convenience. In each course we will cover a section of the software.
title: #18: Bernina Software 7: The Fundamentals of using Rectangle
